attributes.action: Only Allow Immigrants Into Britain That Have Secured Employment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It infuriates me that immigrants can walk into Britain with no intention of working and go on benefits. We should follow the example set by America and only allow people in who have secured jobs and intend to work.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
